prompt.default: Use the nano-banana model to create a 1/7 scale commercialized figure of thecharacter in the illustration, in a realistic styie and environment.Place the figure on a computer desk, using a circular transparent acrylic base without any text.On the computer screen, display the ZBrush modeling process of the figure.Next to the computer screen, a transparent board with a wooden base on which the original artwork is printed.

save_image.hint: 保存目录为插件数据目录
